==Useful Info==
'''Hippogriffs''' are freakish flying hybrids. They have multiple attacks that can add up damage fast against lightly armoured opponents, but aren't particularly threatening otherwise. They can be found in [[the Dungeon]] and [[Lair]].

==Tips & Tricks==
Hippogriffs, like most "natural" creatures, are susceptible to [[poison]] and easy to [[Hexes|hex]].

==History==
*Hippogriffs were removed in [[0.26]].
*In [[0.19]], they were merged with [[griffon]]s, which slightly buffed hippogriffs' HP and damage.
